On Dec 1, 2012, at 9:21 PM, Max Toro <maxtoroq@...> wrote:
> PUT /ord=
ers/1/status
> Canceled

+1

As an aside you'll find maintenance and valida=
tion easier if your status values are all lowercase (all upper would be oka=
y too, but uglier.) 

Has nothing to do with REST, it's just easier to deal=
 with when you don't have to worry what is the proper casing of status valu=
es. FWIW.

-Mike
